cakes.name: Sweets Cakes Chocolate Cookies
cakes.description: Chocolate crème cake with cherries, chocolate mousse and triple sec, whip cream frosting and chocolate crumbles on the sides.

cakes.name: Semi-naked cakes
cakes.description: Our moist white crème cake with fresh strawberry in whip cream and a whip cream frosting.

cakes.name: Sweets Cakes Chocolate Orange fruit
cakes.description: This classic originates from the Hotel Sacher in Vienna, Austria. This cake is a two layer chocolate cake with a glorious raspberry filling. The cake is then covered in chocolate buttercream and topped with chocolate ganache.

cakes.name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
cakes.description: I can recall how immense the hype for Chocolate Fudge Cake was around the same time last year. I failed to understand why anyone would prefer to eat cake with a portion of the frosting missing, it simply bewildered me. However, once photographs of dainty caked draped in flowers and drizzled with all forms of wonderful sauces started flooding social mediums, I finally caved in.

cakes.name: Monkeys
cakes.description: Hand molded monkeys and bananas with fondant.
